name: test_e2e_with_logs[247_LDAP_BASIC_002]
description:

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `LDAP_BASIC_002` |
| **Name** | LDAP password bypass injection |
| **Category** | LDAP |
| **Subcategory** | basic_injection |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

- **Payload**: `*)(|(password=*))`
